import {useState} from 'react' import Nav from "../components/Nav"; import {useCookies} from 'react-cookie' const OnBoarding = () => { const [cookies, setCookie, removeCookie] = useCookies(['user']) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ user_id: cookies.UserId, first_name: '', db_day: '', db_month: '', db_year: '', gender_identity: 'man', gender_show: false, gender_interest: 'woman', avatar: '', about: '', matches: [] }) const handleChange = (e) => { console.log('e', e) const value = e.target.type === 'checkbox' ? e.target.checked : e.target.value const name = e.target.name console.log('value ' + value, 'name ' + name) setFormData((prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value }))) } const handleSubmit = () => { console.log('submitted') } return ( <>
{ }} showModal={false} >

{formData.avatar && }
) } export default OnBoarding
